Description: Four fragments of leather manuscript. One (A) with a finely drawn falcon against a curving star-spangled red mass; the other (B) with larger design of feathers. The third (C) has red lines; the fourth (D) has an area of blue.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Chapel of the King's Statue, R.43.2
Curator's comments: D is mounted with 74102 at present Found with 1992,0725.1 Found with 1992,0725.3
Publication: Parkinson & Schofield in Davies-Schofield, Egypt, the Aegean and the Levant, 125-6.
Published: B. J. Kemp, The City of Akhenaten and Nefertiti: Amarna and its People (Thames and Hudson 2012), pl. XLV.
